name: VIBEFALL
description:
VIBEFALL is a game where you shoot fireballs at shadow people in the desert while you listen to some chill music. Upgrade energy towers, achieve new highscores and feel the vibe.

Made for the "GT2 Game Engines" course at the University of Applied Sciences Berlin by these wondeful people:

https://github.com/jstahf
https://github.com/BlankOSmaxOS
https://github.com/r-seidel
